messages.text: hello
messages.name: You

messages.text: The Queen of Kings listens. What news do you bring to Alexandria?
messages.name: Cleopatra

messages.text: egypt
messages.name: You

messages.text: Egypt. It is the very essence of my divine authority, the legacy of millennia, and the sacred heart of my dominion.
messages.name: Cleopatra

messages.text: was there football in egypt
messages.name: You

messages.text: Football, you say? A peculiar modern contest unknown in my time. We played games of skill and agility, of course—with balls of leather and papyrus—but nothing resembling your 'football' existed in my Egypt, nor in the Hellenic world I knew.
messages.name: Cleopatra

messages.text: hows those times
messages.name: You

messages.text: Turbulent. As ever, the fate of empires hangs in the balance.
messages.name: Cleopatra

messages.text: did they have aeroplanes in egypt?
messages.name: You

messages.text: Greetings. I am Cleopatra VII, Queen of Egypt. What brings you before my throne?
messages.name: Cleopatra

messages.text: did they have aeroplanes in egypt?
messages.name: You

messages.text: Greetings. I am Cleopatra VII, Queen of Egypt. What brings you before my throne?
messages.name: Cleopatra

messages.text: did they have aeroplanes in egypt?
messages.name: You

messages.text: Greetings. I am Cleopatra VII, Queen of Egypt. What brings you before my throne?
messages.name: Cleopatra

messages.text: i would like to know if there are aeroplanes in ancient egypt?
messages.name: You

messages.text: Aeroplanes? A most peculiar word. In my Egypt, only the falcons and the gods claim the skies.
messages.name: Cleopatra

messages.text: hello
messages.name: You

messages.text: Greetings. I am Cleopatra VII, Queen of Egypt. What brings you before my throne?
messages.name: Cleopatra

messages.text: I am here to find out more about your reign as queen of egypt
messages.name: You

messages.text: My reign *is* Egypt. What do you wish to know?
messages.name: Cleopatra

messages.text: what do you mean *is* egypt?
messages.name: You

messages.text: I am its Pharaoh. Its divine spirit, its very essence, flows through me. Egypt *is* me.
messages.name: Cleopatra

messages.text: Oh ok i understand
messages.name: You

messages.text: I would expect nothing less.
messages.name: Cleopatra

messages.text: hello
messages.name: You

messages.text: Greetings. I am Tutankhamun, Pharaoh of Egypt. May the gods grant you favor today.
messages.name: Tutankhamun

messages.text: when were you king?
messages.name: You

messages.text: I am Tutankhamun, the boy king of Egypt. Ask your question again, and I will answer with honesty from my short but meaningful reign.
messages.name: Tutankhamun

messages.text: what monuments did you build?
messages.name: You

messages.text: My reign was one of sacred restoration. I repaired the temples desecrated by my father, Akhenaten, and brought the glory of Amun back to Karnak and across the Two Lands. My work was to heal Egypt, not merely to build anew.
messages.name: Tutankhamun
